mapper.select: select * from investment_institutions where short_name like "%"#{keyword}"%" group by short_name

SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_investment a WHERE a.investment_id = b.`ID` AND a.yn = 1)num, (SELECT MAX(f.yn)s FROM follow_investment f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f.investment_id = b.`ID` GROUP BY f.investment_id )yn FROM investment_institutions b WHERE short_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT COUNT(1) count,c.short_name shortName,c.create_time,c.type,c.logo, case when c.kenel_case is null then (case when c.comment is null then "" else c.comment end) else c.kenel_case end kenelCase, c.comment,c.id FROM (SELECT ii.id,ii.short_name,ii.create_time,ii.type,ii.logo,ii.kenel_case,ii.comment, CASE WHEN p.full_name IS NULL OR p.full_name = '' THEN p.short_name ELSE p.full_name END p_name, pf.financing_time FROM project_financing_log pf LEFT JOIN projects p ON pf.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions_project iip ON iip.project_id = pf.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions ii ON iip.investment_institutions_id = ii.id WHERE pf.financing_time BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND TRIM(pf.stage) IN ('种子轮' , '天使轮', 'Pre-A轮') AND p.`country` = '中国' GROUP BY p_name , pf.stage) c WHERE c.short_name != '' AND c.short_name IS NOT NULL and c.short_name not like "%个人%" and c.logo is not null and c.short_name not like "%投资人%" and c.short_name not like "%自投%" and c.short_name not like "%自筹%" and c.short_name not like "%以及%" and c.short_name not like "%创始人%" AND c.type = 1 GROUP BY c.short_name ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) count,c.short_name shortName,c.create_time,c.type,c.logo, case when c.kenel_case is null then (case when c.comment is null then "" else c.comment end) else c.kenel_case end kenelCase, c.comment,c.id FROM (SELECT ii.id,ii.short_name,ii.create_time,ii.type,ii.logo,ii.kenel_case,ii.comment, CASE WHEN p.full_name IS NULL OR p.full_name = '' THEN p.short_name ELSE p.full_name END p_name, pf.financing_time FROM project_financing_log pf LEFT JOIN projects p ON pf.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions_project iip ON iip.project_id = pf.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions ii ON iip.investment_institutions_id = ii.id WHERE pf.financing_time BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND TRIM(pf.stage) IN ('种子轮' , '天使轮', 'Pre-A轮') AND p.`country` = '中国' GROUP BY p_name , pf.stage) c WHERE c.short_name != '' AND c.short_name IS NOT NULL and c.logo is not null and c.short_name not like "%个人%" and c.short_name not like "%投资人%" and c.short_name not like "%自投%" and c.short_name not like "%自筹%" and c.short_name not like "%以及%" and c.short_name not like "%创始人%" GROUP BY c.short_name ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT investment_institution_id FROM project_financing_investment_institution_relationship WHERE project_send_log_id IN #{item} group by investment_institution_id

SELECT COUNT(1) count,c.short_name,c.create_time,c.type,c.logo, case when c.kenel_case is null then (case when c.comment is null then "" else c.comment end) else c.kenel_case end kenel_case, c.comment,c.id FROM (SELECT ii.id,ii.short_name,ii.create_time,ii.type,ii.logo,ii.kenel_case,ii.comment, CASE WHEN p.full_name IS NULL OR p.full_name = '' THEN p.short_name ELSE p.full_name END p_name, pf.financing_time FROM project_financing_log pf LEFT JOIN projects p ON pf.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions_project iip ON iip.project_id = pf.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions ii ON iip.investment_institutions_id = ii.id WHERE pf.financing_time BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND TRIM(pf.stage) IN ('种子轮' , '天使轮', 'Pre-A轮') AND p.`country` = '中国' GROUP BY p_name , pf.stage) c WHERE c.short_name != '' AND c.short_name IS NOT NULL AND c.type = 1 GROUP BY c.short_name ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) count,c.short_name,c.create_time,c.type,c.logo, case when c.kenel_case is null then (case when c.comment is null then "" else c.comment end) else c.kenel_case end kenel_case, c.comment,c.id FROM (SELECT ii.id,ii.short_name,ii.create_time,ii.type,ii.logo,ii.kenel_case,ii.comment, CASE WHEN p.full_name IS NULL OR p.full_name = '' THEN p.short_name ELSE p.full_name END p_name, pf.financing_time FROM project_financing_log pf LEFT JOIN projects p ON pf.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions_project iip ON iip.project_id = pf.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions ii ON iip.investment_institutions_id = ii.id WHERE pf.financing_time BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND TRIM(pf.stage) IN ('种子轮' , '天使轮', 'Pre-A轮') AND p.`country` = '中国' GROUP BY p_name , pf.stage) c WHERE c.short_name != '' AND c.short_name IS NOT NULL and c.short_name not like "%个人%" and c.short_name not like "%投资人%" and c.short_name not like "%自投%" and c.short_name not like "%自筹%" and c.short_name not like "%以及%" and c.short_name not like "%创始人%" GROUP BY c.short_name ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT investment_institution_id FROM project_financing_investment_institution_relationship WHERE project_send_log_id IN #{item} ORDER BY associated_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) count,c.short_name,c.create_time,c.type,c.logo, case when c.kenel_case is null then (case when c.comment is null then "" else c.comment end) else c.kenel_case end kenel_case, c.comment,c.id,c.financing_time,c.p_name FROM (SELECT ii.id,ii.short_name,ii.create_time,ii.type,ii.logo,ii.kenel_case,ii.comment, CASE WHEN p.full_name IS NULL OR p.full_name = '' THEN p.short_name ELSE p.full_name END p_name, pf.financing_time FROM project_financing_log pf LEFT JOIN projects p ON pf.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions_project iip ON iip.project_id = pf.id LEFT JOIN investment_institutions ii ON iip.investment_institutions_id = ii.id WHERE pf.financing_time BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND TRIM(pf.stage) IN ('种子轮' , '天使轮', 'Pre-A轮') AND p.`country` = '中国' GROUP BY p_name , pf.stage) c WHERE c.short_name != '' AND c.short_name IS NOT NULL and c.short_name not like "%个人%" and c.short_name not like "%投资人%" and c.short_name not like "%自投%" and c.short_name not like "%自筹%" and c.short_name not like "%以及%" and c.short_name not like "%创始人%" GROUP BY c.short_name ORDER BY c.financing_time DESC limit #{startPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
select ID from investment_institutions where short_name =#{companyName};
select short_name from investment_institutions where ID=#{investmentInstitutionsId}
